pros: Extensive experience with AWS, GCP, and Azure cloud platforms.
Strong hands-on experience with Kubernetes and container orchestration.
Proven track record in DevOps and cloud migration projects.
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code using Terraform and Ansible.
cons: Limited information on specific achievements or outcomes in previous roles.
No explicit mention of experience with Oracle Cloud or IBM Cloud.

resume.summary: Seeking a creative & challenging DevOps and Multi Cloud role in an organization where I can enhance my technical skills and use best of my knowledge and experience to achieve client success and increase productivity.

projects.title: EKS Bottlerocket log collector script
projects.description: This is streamlined way for the customers to pull logs from there bottlerocket AMIs. This script creates a compressed archive containing all collected logs and diagnostic information, which can be used for analysis and troubleshoot the Kubernetes worker nodes. Technology used - AWS, Kubernetes, Shell Scripting, CLI commands.

projects.title: EBS CSI analysis automation
projects.description: This automation analyzes EBS CSI driver configurations, rapidly identifies potential issues, and provides effective solutions for quick remediation. Technology used - AWS, Kubernetes, Shell Scripting, CLI commands.

projects.title: Project Tracker AppSheet
projects.description: Developed an Appsheet application for industrial project tracking with automated email notifications for project timelines by implementing webhooks for API integration and real-time client status updates. Technology used - GCP, AppSheet, Webhooks, Google sheets.

education.institution: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University

workExperience.description: Primarily working on AWS managed Kubernetes EKS, managed docker Service ECS, AWS Batch. Hands on experience with troubleshooting Kubernetes clusters and other AWS integrated services...
Closely working with SMEs and Manager to understand the client's requirement and implement accordingly...
Gained hands-on experience in cloud platforms (AWS/Azure), implementing scalable and secure deployment architectures...

interviewNotes.notes: Pros: Extensive cloud experience, strong Kubernetes skills. Cons: Limited info on Oracle/IBM Cloud experience.
